diff_act: 4.output a visual alarm message on the supervisor's computer

regen.absent_element: recording of specific details about the alarm event, such as type of alarm or temperature value
regen.new_specification: The system shall record the specific details of the alarm event, including the type of alarm and the temperature value that triggered it.

regen.absent_element: recording of invalid temperature or temperature limit exceeded event details
regen.new_specification: The system shall record the specific details of the alarm event, including whether it was caused by an invalid temperature value or a temperature limit being exceeded.

regen.absent_element: recording of invalid temperature or exceeded limit event details
regen.new_specification: The system shall record the specific details of the alarm event, including whether it was caused by an invalid temperature value or a temperature limit being exceeded.

label: This series of beeps shall continue until the supervisor manually resets the alarm through the supervisor's interface window.
